trans-unit.source: Provides data for the paint events of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: paint 이벤트에 대 한 데이터를 제공 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A ChartPaintEventArgs object is used to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: ChartPaintEventArgs 개체를 사용 하는 동안 차트 속성을 설정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> property allows you to position chart elements, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property facilitates GDI+ drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>속성 차트 요소를 배치할 수 있습니다 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>속성을 용이 하 게 GDI + 그리기 작업.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property gives the developer access to the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, which can be used to set various properties of the chart.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>속성에 액세스할 수는 개발자 루트 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>차트의 여러 속성을 설정 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Chart property allows the developer to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 차트 속성을 사용 하면 개발자 동안 차트 속성을 설정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the hart element.
Use this object property during a painting event to: - Help with the conversion to and from relative and/or absolute chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체의 속성을 사용 하 여 그리기 이벤트 중:-차트/상대 또는 절대 좌표 사이에 변환에 대 한 도움말입니다.

trans-unit.source: - Perform custom drawing using a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: --GDI +를 사용 하 여 사용자 지정 그리기를 수행 하는 중 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>개체입니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 그리기 이벤트 동안이 개체의 속성을 사용 하 여 차트 요소를 배치 합니다.
